title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message in the 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'
OB: When invoking the 'New Java Package' wizard, the following message appears at the top: 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'. This message is displayed even when the package name field is empty, creating confusion about its meaning and whether it is an error. Additionally, it is suggested that if it is an error, it should be presented in red with the error icon.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new Java Project. 2. Select the project. 3. Invoke the 'New Java Package' wizard.
